definition: (of a nation) to be destroyed/subjugation/vanquished nation
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
country destroyed, its people annihilated (idiom); total destruction
subjugated people/refugee from a destroyed country

sentences.english: Chancellery is fraught, to fraud of kingly painful Chen Li, say to handle bad meeting a conquered nation.
sentences.chinese: 大臣心急如焚，向国王痛陈利弊，说弄不好会亡国。

sentences.english: Sharper even than this sadness was the fact that, for more than 30 years, she was an exile from her homeland.
sentences.chinese: 比这更悲惨的是她30多年离乡背井，被迫流亡国外。

sentences.english: Expatriate South Sudanese are also coming home in droves after decades of civil war.
sentences.chinese: 流亡国外的南苏丹人也正在大批返乡。

definition: to be destroyed/to become extinct/to perish/to die out/to destroy/to exterminate
the country ruined and the people starving (idiom)
